00024 static void ob_t(void* par,
00025                  const Gaussian* G1, const Gaussian* G2, 
00026                  const GaussianAux* X, complex double* t)
00027 {       
00028     *t += 0.5/mass(G1->xi)* (3*X->lambda + X->pi2) * X->Q;
00029 }
